titles.title: Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Security Authorization Act of 2011
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to codify the requirement that the Secretary of Homeland Security maintain chemical facility anti-terrorism security regulations.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.subcommittee: Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and the Economy.

committee.subcommittee: Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by the Yeas and Nays: 6 - 4 .
